desc:
After the crisis in Cordelica, the Summoner and Karl run into Lugina, who has a special request from Summoners' Hall.
He says they are to survey a great forest where the treasure of an empress is hidden.
The Summoner and Lugina take different routes to reach the same forest, but end up running into each other on a third route where they spot Paris...
name: Proud Soldier's Feast
